numlitem.para: Operation of remaining yaw damper is verified to be operative, and
Associated yaw damper switch remains OFF.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Downgrade Aircraft Category Dispatch Status to CAT 3a.

placard.para: Placard affected Yaw Damper Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Verify the proper operation of the remaining yaw damper by performing the following:

numlitem.para: Establish electrical power per (AMM 24-22-00/201) and hydraulic power per (AMM 29-11-00/201).
Verify that the IRUs are aligned and in NAV mode.
Perform CMC YDM ACT ground test for the operational yaw damper using AMM (22-21-00).

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
